cardContent.initHelperText: You can view your user details and update any item of them if you need

cardContent.helperText: Enter your fist name (It is at least 2 and not more than 15 characters long)
Enter your last name (It is at least 2 and not more than 15 characters long)
Enter your phone (It is at least 7 and not more than 12 digits long)
Enter your date of birth or select date from calendar pop-up and range of birth-year is from 1930 to 2020.
Enter your contact name (It is at least 2 and not more than 15 characters long)
Enter your contact phone (It is at least 7 and not more than 12 digits long)
Describe the relation between you and your contact person.
